origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CarSharingAPI.analyze_financials', 'description': 'This function analyzes the financial statements of a specified car sharing company for a given financial year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'company', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the car sharing company, e.g., Zipcar, Car2Go.'}, {'name': 'financialYear', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The financial year for the analysis, e.g., 2022, 2021.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'financialAnalysis', 'description': 'The analysis of the financial statements for the specified company and financial year.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CarSharingAPI.analyze_financials, 它的参数输入如下: 'company'是'Zipcar', 'financialYear'是'2022'.
